metadata.Title: CVE-2018-15879 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description:
** REJECT ** DO NOT USE THIS CANDIDATE NUMBER. ConsultIDs: CVE-2019-6978.Reason: This candidate is a reservation duplicate of CVE-2019-6978. Notes:All CVE users should reference CVE-2019-6978 instead of this candidate. Allreferences and descriptions in this candidate have been removed to preventaccidental usage.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-15879` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libgd-tools - 2.1.0-3ubuntu0.10
libgd3 - 2.1.0-3ubuntu0.10
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libgd2 package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.1.0-3ubuntu0.10').
